review: It was such a pleasant experience getting treated by Dr. Sumit & Dr. Priyanka as they made the treatment feel so trouble-free & comfortable. Dr Sumit ably provided all the briefings before starting the treatment making it much easier to understand the proceedings. The clinic is also well maintained & equipped with necessary tools while taking care of the required hygiene. It is worth a visit for suitable treatment of varied Dental issues. Heartfelt thanks to Dr Sumit & Dr. Priyanka.

review: Always have a great, smooth experience here. The staff and doctor are friendly, respectful, caring and courteous of your time.Very warm and welcoming environment.The doctor was great and gave me the detailed explanation of the procedures to be done which was very helpful since you know what to expect during the treatment loved the service and would definitely recommend to family and friends.

My treatment and experience with the doctors was great here . They were very kind and unlike other doctors they explained me the problems in detail . The treatment was professionally done with no discomfort and im really happy with the treatment . I’m glad i choose to h da e my treatment here .

Dr. Sumit is extremely down to earth and patiently listens to all your queries. I had visited him regarding my smile makeover and he gave me the best treatment with minimal recovery time. The process went absolutely smoothly and I am very happy with the results. All thanks to Dr. Sumit my face has a new smile. Will definitely recommend him to my friends.
** ***** ** ****** ** ***** ****** *********** RCT has been smooth with proper advice & guidance on the future course of actions.

Dr.Sumit is a very professional doctor, I went for my braces and it went really well also didn’t feel a thing while in the whole journey it will super light and successful treatment :)

review: I did my invisalign treatment for malaligned teeth. The procedure was explained in detail and Dr Sumit took special care to make the process smooth. I am able to flaunt my new smile now. Highly recommended .

N no pain at all during n after treatment
The best dental care I have experienced! Professional, courteous, and friendly staff made me feel like family… would highly recommend to anyone!!!
I did my Invisalign treatment at the clinic. Very happy with the results. Dr Sumit and Dr Priyanka are perfect with their work.
I was very satisfied with the service and results. Dr Priyanka did multiple caps in my mouth. She replaced my caps with perfection. Very happy with the results

Got my Teeth whitening done at the clinic. The clinic interiors was good, staff courteous and knowledgeable and kind doctors. Would recommend as a to go place in dadar prabhadevi for any dental treatment.

review: Very good clinic for all types of dental work. Both Dr Sumit and Dr Priyanka are highly skilled and knowledgeable about their work. The clinic is well equipped with all the latest equipment and they take very good care of the patients.

Dr Sumit Bohra is an excellent dentist , during my treatment I was very apprehensive about my tooth extraction, not only he saved my tooth , he also excavated the tricky decay very well without any major discomfort . He has excellent with his work . I highly recommend him .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Had visited the clinic for a root canal treatment and an implant. Dr Sumit was very professional with her work . Thank you for the smooth dental care.
I did my cleanup and tooth replacement with implants by Dr Sumit. The experience has been very good and friendly from the whole team. Also, the clinic is very hygienic
Dr Sumit did my implant surgery for my front teeth. I can confidently smile again and no more conscious about it
